text:
Yo brother, Very simple and cool roommate. Bhai tere saath toh bohot si memories he, but vo Gajendra se chupke bhaage the doaa canteen se, shayad vo snt code wali night thi. All the parties and bullas. or vo second year ki antaragni wali night, drinks wali. 
Thanks for all the selfless help you have given. Hope to see you soon bro,.... Love you
author: Ayush  Bhorse

text:
Hi anchal, you are a really beautiful, cool and caring person. I'm glad to call you as a friend thanks to  techkriti. All the treats we've enjoyed and memories are precious. to me. 
hope to meet you soon, Love you and take care.
author: Ayush  Bhorse

text:
Hey bro, real Head Finance, How can you be so good at everything, you must be the one that has lived everything in IIT kanpur. from accads to bullas you excelled in everything.
whenever we've talked, it felt like you really understood me. Thanks for all the help and support. hoping we'll meet soon someday
author: Ayush  Bhorse

text:
Bhai Dhiman, tere saath hi meri sabse zada yaadein hogi mere khyal se. Exam ke kuch ghante pehle wali studies aur assignment jugaad ke chhaapna. exams me cheating yaad rahegi. Bhai tune hi maal ka introduction diya. Dance foot foot kar bahar aa raha tha. 
Aur bhai sabse badiya workout partner tha. jald hi milke start karte hai workout. tab tak ke liye Take care and love ypu bro
author: Ayush  Bhorse

text:
Hi, yeah Fine Arts hi hai jisne hame milaya. I found u beautiful, charming and really interesting. And haan thanks for keeping the sketch. thanks for being such a nice person
Milte hai kabhi, world is small
author: Ayush  Bhorse

text:
Bro, you are God. How can someone be so good in everything. I've learned a lot from you and will still learn. me bohot khushkismet hu jo tere jesaa dost paya bro. I don't how I can repay you all the selfless help provided by you every time. bhai vo gym wale din and mth me exams hamesha yaad rahenge, mere doubts clear karne ke liye shukriya.

Bro, I really want to meet you soon till then I can only say thank you and love you brother.
author: Ayush  Bhorse

text:
Hi Avani,
Tu bohot cute hai yr. Apne ko to techkriti ne hi milaya. So a big thanks to techkriti for that. Most of the moment apne hasi mazak me hi nikle hai. regret rehega lekin koi photo saath me nahi khichwai. But vo video yaad rhega high hoke bakchodi kar rahe the (vo video clip ho to bhejna). 
you are a really nice and humble person and a really good friend. hope to see you soon, love you
:Bhorse
author: Ayush  Bhorse
